claim: Early patient identification for potential facility discharges may allow for targeted interventions to prevent functional decline, improve informed shared decision-making about post-acute care needs, and may expedite discharge planning.Figure 1.
title: Figure 1. Hospital Admission Risk Profile (HARP) Scoring System Used to Calculate HARP Score.
caption:
Note: From Sager 1996. Figure based on Appendix 113
MMSE = Mini-Mental Status Exam, IADL = Instrumental Activities of Daily Living
